!Pet Manager Woods: Kaiser! Come here...yes...good boy! Oh, hello. Ah, you noticed my pure-bred black-striped Alpen Cougar, eh? It is naturally a violent beast, but if you reise it right from birth you can train it to be as gentle as a lamb. Just remember to feed it on time!
